1175090.name: BlazBlue Cross Tag Battle Ver 2.0 Expansion Pack
1175090.description:
Version 2.0 is now available!
Below items are included in this DLC.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
There are 9 new characters joining the fray, with some coming from
series new to the Cross Tag universe!
-Senran Kagura Estival Versus (NEW!); Yumi
-Akatsuki Blitzkampf (NEW!): Akatsuki, Blitztank
-BlazBlue: Celica A. Mercury, Susano’o
-Persona 4 Arena Ultimax: Adachi, Elizabeth
-Under Night In-Birth: Hilda
-RWBY: Neo Politan

New avatars, icons, and VS Plates!

Additional above content for the new 9 characters will be added.

New color palettes!

4 new colors to choose for all 53 characters.

New stories!

New stories will be added, including appearances by the new characters.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*All of the above content will be available by purchasing the DLC being released on November 21st.
*Basic system updates such as character balance and UI updates will be available without purchasing the DLC.
1175090.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语*, 韩语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
